Crypto Black Jack How to Play Prizes Easy setup Statistics About Smart Contract

How

No cost limit per game.
Taking bank ownership increase you chance of winning and can be very rewarding.
As a player, beat the bank, win the jackpot and take the ownership.
Detailed Rules

Where

Cyptoball Lottery is fully decentralized and it is unstoppable. It runs globally. The Cryptoball Lottery Smart Contract is autonomous and runs every 24 hours on the Signum-Blockchain. Everyone can join & win. Wins are paid directly to your Signum-Account from the Cryptoball Smart Contract, without the need for a middleman.
